      • getSource

        public int getSource()
        Returns:
        One of SOURCE_NEW, SOURCE_INBITMAP or SOURCE_UNKNOWN depending on how this Bitmap was created.

      • isBitmapValid

        public boolean isBitmapValid()
        Returns true when this wrapper has a bitmap and the bitmap has not been recycled.
        Returns:
        true - if the bitmap has not been recycled.

      • isBitmapMutable

      • isBeingDisplayed

        public boolean isBeingDisplayed()
        Returns:
        true - if the bitmap is currently being displayed by a CacheableImageView.

      • isReferencedByCache

        public boolean isReferencedByCache()
        Returns:
        true - if the wrapper is currently referenced by a cache.

        Used to signal to the Drawable whether it is being used or not.
